    Verdaccio

    Verdaccio is a simple, zero-config-required local private npm registry. Verdaccio to use all benefits of npm package system in your company without sending all code to the public, and use your private packages just as easy as public ones.

    Packages

    http://tfstools.cdevteam.com:4873/

    Installing

    > $ npm i <package-name>;

    Usage

    After package is installed in your project, just need to import it as if it was a local component.

    > import ActionButton from 'ActionButton';

    Project

    Getting Started

    • Clone
    > import ActionButton from 'ActionButton';
    • npm install
    > npm install;
    • Run

    After packages have been installed you can run project locally

    > npm run storybook;

    When project runs, a Storybook page is opened where you can test UI components.
